en: When was the last time you went on a vacation?
I went on a vacation last summer with my coworkers to Jeju Island.
ko: 작년 여름에 직장 동료들이랑 제주도 갔었어

en: We couldn't do much because we only stayed for three days.
ko: 2박 3일밖에 못 갔다 와서 뭐 많이는 못했어

en: We went hiking on the first day and fishing on the second.
Did you have any local food?
We had fresh seafood and black pork.
